message: Let's split it 7:3, fair and square!
You're lowballing me! I want a better deal!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
I'll meet you a little above the middle, but I'm not going all the way!
You're getting closer, Bob! Meet me at 6:4!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
Let's find a sweet spot, Bob! 55:45 is fair, don't you think?
